data.title: Top Ten Chinese Celebrities Split Up After Years Of Marriage
data.meta_description: Get an inside look into the personal lives of Top Ten Chinese Celebrities whose marriages unfortunately came to an end, despite their love and commitment.
data.text:
Celebrities Tong and Chen got married in the year 2014. It was a loving relationship, and they even had a son. However, Chen got caught having multiple affairs, which affected their relationship andult imately led to a divorce in 2017. Libya wrote on her social media, “I had a worthwhile time, and I am looking forward to the future. Thank you”.

1. Wen Zhang And Ma Yili

The celebrity couple fell in love while shooting the drama Struggle in2006. They tied the knot in 2008, and a beautiful daughter was born the same year. Wen gotcaught having an affair with another co-star while Ma was pregnant with their second child. The couple then divorced in 2019. Wen wrote on his social media account, “We walked together half the journey and separated with a parting.” He

also made a public apology.

2. Sandy Lam And Jonathan Lee

Music producer and lyricist Jonathan Lee and singer Sandy Lam were married for six years. They married in 1998 and split up in 2004. They have a daughter named Renee. Later in his song “Understanding,” he expressed his feelings writing, “If our love was a mistake, then let’s hope you and I didn’t suffer in vain.”

3. Faye Wong And Li Yapeng

The couple tied their knot in 2005 and gave birth to a beautiful daughter named Li Yan. They separated in September 2013,following which Wong wrote a message on his social media “This is the end of our life as husband and wife. I’m doing well, and take care too.” Li replied, saying “the only thing I could do for her was to let her go with my heart full of regrets.”

4. Archie Kao And Zhou Xun

The couple publicly announced their marriage in 2014. There were rumors about Kao and another girl kissing in a picture which might have been the reason. Nevertheless, their work life was also the reason for their separation in 2020. Their relationship lasted six years. They ended it by saying “good luck” to each other on social media.

5. Selina Jen And Richard Chang

Lawyer Richard Chang asked singer Selina Zhang to be his girlfriend. They eventually married in 2011 and promised to be together through thick and thin. But after four years, they separated, and she believed she wasn’t a good wife.

6. Zanilia Zhao And William Feng

The couple acted together in many dramas and finally confirmed

their relationship in 2018. They married in the same year in October.

Their work life was the reason for their separation in 2021. They

have a son together.

7. Wang Leehom And Lee Jinglei

The King of Chinese Pop Wang Leehom And Lee Jinglei got married in

2013 and were shining examples in China. They had three beautiful

babies. The couple later had a messy divorce as the pop star was

accused of infidelity, emotional abuse, and hiring prostitutes. They

separated in 2021. His career was hampered and he had to apologize

to the public.

8. Huang Xiaoming And Angelababy

Actress Angelababy and actor Huang Xiaoming married in 2015 after

much speculation from the public. They decided to raise their son

together and split up in 2022. Both put up identical posts on social

media, writing “Grateful for everything in the past and we’ll still be a

family in the future.”

9. Wang Xiaofei And Barbie Hsu

Actress Barbie Hsu best known for her role in Meteor Garden was married to Wang Xiaofei, a businessman, in 2011. Despite much criticism from the public, they stayed strong for a decade and later split up in 2021. They have two children together. They are now discussing the custody of their children and the splitting of assets.

10. Tong Liya And Chen Sicheng

Celebrities Tong and Chen got married in the year 2014. It was a loving relationship, and they even had a son. However, Chen got caught having multiple affairs, which affected their relationship andult imately led to a divorce in 2017. Libya wrote on her social media ,“I had a worthwhile time, and I am looking forward to the future. Thank you”.
